name: Summer Days (itch) (Bryan Sturm, Thom An, MKcyborg, Riley)
name_original: Summer Days (itch) (Bryan Sturm, Thom An, MKcyborg, Riley)
description:
As a summer of chaos comes to its end, local troublemakers and best friends Amy and Joel reminisce about their time. Hidden in their favorite spot by the river, they overhear a secret that will bring them to stir up one last round of glorious chaos. Join them as they find trouble, snoop around, and maybe even save the town.

Summer Days is a visual novel made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021. The theme was "Let there be chaos." In the week-long duration of the jam, the team did not finish writing or implementing the entire story, but we have completed two introductory scenes for your enjoyment.

As game developers, we are always learning and growing. If you have any thoughts or feedback on the game's writing, audio, visuals, or anything else, please let us know!

Thank you for playing!

Controls

Advance Text - Left Click / Space.

Return to Main Menu - Hold escape for 5 seconds.

Credits
  • Thom An (YouTube) - Music
  • Riley (Itch) - Writing (Outline, Editing), Design, Camera
  • Brian Renadette (Portfolio) - Writing (Outline, Script)
  • Bryan Sturm (Itch) - Programming

3D Assets made by Kenney. Includes assets from Nature Kit and Fantasy Town Kit.

Uses "Balsamiq Sans" from Google Fonts.

Made in Unity.
